bug.author: ktfth
bug.summary: Have a default value for monitor on Early Stopping callback?

comments.comment: is the default value for monitor. See <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/callbacks/EarlyStopping#__init>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/keras/callbacks/EarlyStopping#__init</denchmark-link> __
